column4: tsie; na Israel a masan mu meyi wo:"

column3: na ɔhyehyɛɛ wo fii yafun mu na ɔbɔboa wo no
column4: se nye yi: M’akowaa Jakob
column6: Jerusalɛm a masan mu meyi wo."

column2: "Na mubohue nsu egu nyia nsukɔm dze no no do
column3: na nsubansuba egu daadze kɛsɛɛ do: mubohue mo sunsum egu w’asefo do
column4: na me nhyira egu hɔn a wofi wo mu do:"

column3: meyɛ EWURADZE dze; na obi so dze Jakob ne dzin afrɛ noho; na obi so bio dze ne nsa akyerɛw dɛ ɔyɛ EWURADZE dze
column4: na ɔdze Israel ne dzin ato no do."
na no pomfo
column6: ɔse nye yi: Emi nye ɔkandzifo
column7: na emi nye okyidzifo; na nyame bi nnyi hɔ ka mo ho."

column2: "Woana na ɔtse dɛ emi? Ma ɔnka ɛ. Ma ɔmpaa mu nka mfa nsi m’enyim. Woana na ofi tsetseetse ɔakyerɛ ndzɛmba a ɔreba
column3: na ɔman a medze besi hɔ no na dza ɔbɛba no? Wɔmma wɔnda dza ɔbɛba no edzi ɛ."
eso mma hom bo nntu: ana mimmfi tsetse na mekaa kyerɛɛ hom
column4: na medze kyerɛe? Na homara nye m’adasefo. Aso Nyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ ka mo ho? Ɛhɛɛ
column5: Ɔbotan bi nnyi hɔ; minnyim biara."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔyɛ ohonyi a woesian nyinara yɛ egyangyandze; na hɔn enyigyedze ho nnkɛba mfaso: na hɔnankasa hɔn adasefo runnhu adze
column3: eso wonnyim adze; ama hɔn enyi aato."
anaa oegu ohonyi a woesian a mfaso bi nnyi ho?"
nsɛfo nyinara enyi bɔtoto; na edwimfo no
column4: adasamba yi ara bi a: wɔmma hɔn nyinara wɔmboa ano fakor
na ɔdze nhamɛr bor no
column5: na ɔdze n’abaw dzendzen yɛ ho edwuma: nyew

column2: "Duadwimfo dze ahoma to; ɔdze ntwoma sensan; ɔdze twerɛw ndadze siesie ho
column4: na osian no nyimpa saso
na ɔhyɛ kwaa mu ndua bi dzen ma noho: ɔtsɛw nkyindur ndua

column2: "Nna nkyii ɔbɛyɛ dza nyimpa dze kua ogya; na ɔfa bi na ɔdze to hyew; nyew
column4: na ɔto boodoo: nyew
column6: na ɔsom no; ɔyɛ no ohonyi a woesian

column2: "Ɔsɔ ne fa bi ogya mu; ɔdze ne fa bi so dzi nam; ɔkyew nam
column4: ɔto so
column7: mo ho ayɛ me hyew ae

column2: "Ne nkaa no ɔdze yɛ bosom bi
column3: no honyi a woesian no a: ɔkotow no
column4: na ɔsɔr no
column7: Gye me; na ɔwo nye me nyame."

column3: eso wɔnndwen ho: osiandɛ ɔaseram hɔn enyi
column4: ma wonntum nnhu; na hɔn akoma

column3: eso nyimdzee anaa ntseasee bi nnyi hɔ a ɔdze bɛse dɛ
column4: Masɔ ne fa bi wɔ ogya mu; nyew
column5: medze ne gyabiriw bi ato boodoo; makyew nam na medzi: na aso medze ne nkaa no mebɛyɛ ewurkadze? Aso mobɔkotow duasin?"

column2: "Nso na odzi: akoma a wɔadaadaa no no dze no aman nkyɛn
column4: anaa ɔnnka dɛ
column5: Aso nnyɛ ator na ɔwɔ me nsa nyimfa mu yi?"

column4: osiandɛ ɔwo nye m’akowaa: emi na mahyehyɛ wo; ɔwo nye n’akowaa. Ao Israel
na wo ndzebɔn
column5: dɛ nsuwusiw: san bra me nkyɛn; na mapon wo."

column4: na EWURADZE na ɔayɛ; asaase ase noho
column7: na ndua a ɔwɔ mu nyinara
column8: hom mfa ehurusi ndwom: na EWURADZE apon Jakob
column9: na ɔbɛhyɛ noho enyimnyam wɔ Israel mu."

column4: na nyia ɔhyehyɛɛ wo fii yafun mu no
column5: ɔse nye yi: Emi nye EWURADZE a ɔyɛ ndzɛmba nyinara no; no nko ara twe ɔsorsor mu; na ɔtserɛw asaase mu; woana ka mo ho?"

column3: na ɔma ebisatsirfo bobɔ adam; nyia ɔma enyansafo san ekyirekyir
column4: na ɔyɛ hɔn nyimdzee nkwaseasɛm:"

column3: na ɔma n’abɔfoe hɔn apam ba mu; nyia ɔka wɔ Jerusalɛm ho dɛ
column4: Wɔbɛtsena no mu; na wɔ Juda nkurow no ho dɛ
na mebɛma w’esutsen awewew:"
na ɔbɛma mo botae nyina ayɛ hɔ: ɔbɛka wɔ Jerusalɛm ho mpo dɛ
column5: Wɔbɛkyekyer; na asɔrfi no ho dɛ
